Title: Authorizes Larry Mendel to receive his 30 years of service credit granting eligibility for the length of service award program
Summary: Authorizes Larry Mendel to receive his 30 years of service credit granting eligibility for the length of service award program.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing Larry Mendel to receive his 30 years of service credit granting eligibility for the length of service award program
